## Discussion

The polyline object in this property contains the geometry for this step. You can use the polyline object as an overlay in a map view.

# polyline

**Instance Property**

The detailed step geometry.

## Declaration

```swift
var polyline: MKPolyline { get }
```

## Discussion

The polyline object in this property contains the geometry for this step. You can use the polyline object as an overlay in a map view.
title: polyline
